Name: The Great Divide
About the game: PRESENTATION This is a 2D old-school RPG in the vein of Last Heroes and Skyfall. The One Being, the Goddess who ruled it all, one day grew tormented by the actions of its own creations. That frustration led to what is known as The Great Divide. The One Being was split in two, a Spirit of Good and a Spirit of Evil. The world faces unbalance as those spirits fight each other for full control. Yas and Ursula are two best friends who lived their whole lives in Buccan Village, an idyllic place far away from all the troubles of the world, it's as if it exists in its own reality. That all changes when a stranger shows up at their shores... FEATURES Classic good and evil storyline, reminiscent of the great classics and mythologies Journey through forests, caves, mountains, valleys and shrines Up to 10 hours of exciting gameplay Sidequests and optional dungeons to complete Quest Journal to keep track of your missions Mouse Support
